featured.name: Github
featured.notes:
# Hiccup GitHub Repository

This is the official GitHub repository for Hiccup, a static start page for your most important links.

## Features
- Static webpage
- Featured links
- Categories
- Search support

[View the code](https://github.com/ashwin-pc/hiccup)
